properties.Name: InsuranceProductFeatureType
properties.Description:
A feature type that is available to an insurance product / policy.

Ex:
- On-line policy information access
- On-line bill-pay
- On-line billing
- 24/7 customer service
- 24/7 Claim Hotline
- Annually Renewable
- Assignable Policy
- Reinstatable Policy
- Convertible
- Renewable
- Conditionally-Renewable Policy
- Lifetime Renewability
- Policy loans
- Cash Surrender Value
- Living Benefits
- Paid-Up Policy
- Umbrella Policy
- Defined Event Insurance Policy
- Accidental Loss Insurance Policy
- 12-Month Rate Protection

where:

Annually Renewable Indicator 
Indicates that the policy is annually renewable. 

Assignable Policy Indicator 
Indicates that the policy was an assigned policy. 

Reinstatable Policy Indicator 
Indicates that the insurance policy was reinstated. 

Conditional Contract Indicator 
Indicates that the policy is a conditional policy, which is a contract hat contains a number of conditions that both parties must comply with. An insurance policy is a conditional contract. 

Conditionally-Renewable Contract Indicator 
Indicates that the policy is conditionally-renewable. 

Paid-Up Policy Indicator 
An insurance policy that requires no further premium payments but continues to provide coverage. 

Rated Policy Indicator 
An insurance policy that is classified as having a greater-than-average likelihood of loss, usually issued with special exclusions, a premium rate that is higher than the rate for a standard policy, a reduced face amount, or any combination of these. Umbrella Policy Indicator Coverage for losses above the limit of an underlying policy or policies such as homeowners and auto insurance. While it applies to losses over the dollar amount in the underlying policies, terms of coverage are sometimes broader than those of underlying policies. 

Defined Event Insurance Policy Indicator 
It can either be "defined event" i.e. the policy covers loss or damage from a list of "defined" events, e.g. storm or fire; or "accidental loss or damage" i.e. all accidental loss with some exclusions.

Columns.Name: ProductFeatureTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Feature Type.

Columns.Name: ProductFeatureTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Product Feature Type.

Columns.Name: ProductFeatureTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Product Feature Type.
